Reviews.Title: “Really good value for the location”

Reviews.Content: ive stayed various hotels sydney price range sydney hotelsmotels expensive rate queen basic clean bed wheels rolls easily minor receptionist friendly complaints

Reviews.Title: “Great value option if you want to park and ride!”
Reviews.Author: NodrogSouthAustralia
Reviews.Content: budget priced option didnt expectations street appeal poor helped drive window entrance massive sliding gate car park reception wasnt drive staff warm welcoming beyond previously mentioned gate secure car park left car day visit public transport short walk saved cost motel avoiding car parking charges sydneys cbd mind avoided stress basic functional clean cable tv towels plentiful basic tolietries quiet appears renovation drilling noises 730 am overall reasonably experience value money

Reviews.Title: “Scary on the outside, safe and comfortable on the inside”
Reviews.Author: si_vorny
Reviews.Content: pulled marco polo thinking bars reception didnt confidence inside gates quiet clean comfortable stay night cheapest found stay sydney free parking free internet plus minus pipes decided song dance morning guess neighbours shower

Reviews.Title: “Clean and close to train”
Reviews.Author: 17larry
Reviews.Content: stayed week found adequate motel quiet clean maintained friendly helpful staff park car public transportation bus front train short 3 block walk restaurants grocery store near train station

Reviews.Title: “Adequate, but dont try too sleep in.”
Reviews.Author: 3Lechacal3
Reviews.Content: 8th time staying marco polo time little 1 2 hour rental drift issues standard motel issues main nonsense carried cleaners 730am onwards people understand people wish awake time happened time response management noise goes night road noise minimal priced free wireless microwave free pay tv usually associated price range motel close sydney city value dont expect peaceful sleep

Reviews.Title: “Clean, small rooms. Noisy traffic and other guests. VERY small limited parking spaces.”

Reviews.Content: clean parking spaces passenger bags car squeezed car remaining car space lifts cart bags flights stairs accidentally drive past entrance motel drive past cant hand motel claims soundproofed found unfortunately hear traffic 247 didnt nights sleep asian families staying kids running outdoor corridors yelling loud kids wasnt appreciated morning lady reception friendly welcoming complimentary newspaper biscuits nice touch

Reviews.Title: “Not A Great Motel and Parking Tight”
Reviews.Author: ToniBee
Reviews.Content: stayed feb 2010 whilst attending acdc concert rd olympic park stadium stayed accomodation close venue scarce closest olympic park seriously pick motel choice read reviews definatly gone else touch screen check outside office closed smelly dirty age described lots dodgy people parking tight difficult definatly recommend staying unless desperate
